definition: to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: 17From Miletus, Paul sent to Ephesus for the elders of the church.
sentences.chinese: 保罗从米利都打发人往以弗所去，请教会的长老来。

sentences.english: Frank consults his niece, Ann, about how to handle an insect invasion.
sentences.chinese: 弗兰克向他的侄女安请教如何对付昆虫的侵害。
让我们请教埃文，薛定谔吧。

sentences.english: Pet owners should handle with gloves, a mask and consult veterinarians .
sentences.chinese: 照顾生病的动物时应戴上手套及口罩，或兽医请教。

sentences.english: Please fill in the disembarkation card and the Baggage Declaration Form.
sentences.chinese: 对不起。请教我怎么填写这张入境卡好吗？

sentences.english: You are suggested to seek for help if you encounter any problems in filling this application form.
sentences.chinese: 如在填写表格时遇有任何疑问，可向老师请教。

sentences.english: I had to listen to the manager and players like Giggsy – he gives me advice all the time.
sentences.chinese: 我请教过经理和老将，他们总是给我建议。

sentences.english: He disdained to turn to his son for advice.
sentences.chinese: 他不屑向自己的儿子请教。

sentences.english: When you have any problems you can consult with an experienced colleague of yours.
sentences.chinese: 当你碰到问题时，你可以向有经验的同事请教。

sentences.english: so it's nice because I have, like I can talk to my teachers whenever I want.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得这样很好，因为我随时可以找老师请教。

sentences.english: When they had finished he went round to the organist to make inquiries.
sentences.chinese: 试唱一结束，他就走过去向风琴师请教。

sentences.english: My friend asked me for some advice about how to give a guy a good blowjob.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友向我请教如何给男生来个质量高的KJ。

sentences.english: Park said he had consulted various experts about the film.
sentences.chinese: 帕克说关于这部电影他请教了不同的专家。

sentences.english: Consult a 2003 card remote management capabilities to the next difficult.
sentences.chinese: 请教2003下网卡远程管理功能地疑难。

sentences.english: Please consult the External Interfaces Guide for information on debugging MEX-files.
sentences.chinese: 请请教外部的接口针对数据的导引调试该MEX文件。

sentences.english: I came here specially to ask you for advice.
sentences.chinese: 我是专程来这里向你请教的。

definition: to point out/to indicate/to give directions/to show how (to do sth)/to censure/to pick at
to pay a visit/to call on
to dispel doubts/to clear up confusion
to question/to ask/to raise a question
what one has learned (through experience, reading etc)/knowledge/insight/understanding/tips/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to say hello to/to send one's regards to
